sentences: Kevin "Kevvy Mental" Maher (born April 20, 1988) is a Canadian musician, producer, film composer and remix artist, most notable for his work in Fake Shark as lead vocalist and programmer.
In 2008, Maher teamed up with writer/director CJ Wallis to score the Sarah Slean short film Last Flowers.
In 2012, co-wrote and produced part of Carly Rae Jepsen's new record, Kiss, and wrote the Fake Shark - Real Zombie! record Liar.
Matt Webb of Marianas Trench (band) – EP Producer (2011)
Carly Rae Jepsen – Kiss – Writer / Producer (2012)
Anami Vice – Are You Serious – Producer (2012)
We Need Surgery – Self Titled – Producer (2012)
The Birthday Massacre – Hide and Seek – Synthesizer / Drums (2012)
Carly Rae Jepsen – Emotion Side B - Writer (2016)
